title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.50 - Intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 651.50 - Intent

State Regulations

The intent of granting State aid to municipalities for
operation and maintenance of sewage treatment works is to assist municipalities
in protecting the quality of the State's waters thereby increasing their
availability for use by requiring efficient operation and preventive
maintenance of such treatment works. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
651.50

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
